simplesect.para:
The program is distributed as a self extracting installation program usually named SetupGraph.exe. To install, just execute the installation and follow the instructions. The installation will install the following files in the selected directory and subdirectories:
Installed files
Graph.exe The program file.
*.mo Translations of the program.
*.hlp Help files in different languages.
*.cnt Content for the corresponding help file.
*.grf Some examples that can be opened by the program.
Thumbnails.dll Shell extension for showing thumbnails of grf-files in Explorer.
The installation will create a shortcut in the Start menu, which may be used to start the program. Under the installation you can select the preferred language. This can later be changed from the .

If an older version of the program is already installed, the installation suggests you install in the same directory. You can just install over the old version. There is no need to uninstall the old version first, but make sure the old version is not running while installing.

Uninstallation is done from Add/Remove Programs in the Control Panel. Just select Graph and click on the Change/Remove button. This will remove all traces of the program. If files were added to the installation directory after the installation, you will be asked if you want to delete them. Make sure the program is not running while uninstalling.
